Topic.Title: What music are you listening too right now?

Posts.EditableText: I"m listening to Judas Priest~ Hell bent for leather.
Posts.HTML: I"m listening to Judas Priest~ Hell bent for leather.

The sweet-sweet music of;
Office workers mumbling, paper being sorted, printers occasionally revving up, mouse scrolling and keyboard tapping, annoying phones loudly ringing away, and my soul draining through the plughole of eternity.

So in one word: Cher.
